00115     public function GetDependencies($type=null) {
00116         $dependenciesToReturn = array();
00117         foreach($this->dependencies as $dependency) {
00118             if($type == null || $type == $dependency->GetType()) {
00119                 $dependenciesToReturn[] = $dependency;
00120             }
00121         }
00122         return $dependenciesToReturn;
00123     }

00236     public function AddC1RemoveScriptFromRCB(IReader $reader) {
00237         if($this->removeScript != '') {
00238             throw new Exception('Script already added!');
00239         }
00240         $rcb = new COB($reader);
00241         $ablocks = $rcb->GetBlocks(COB_BLOCK_AGENT);
00242         $this->removeScript = $ablocks[0]->GetInstallScript();
00243     }

00251     public static function CreateFromReaderC2(IReader $reader) {
00252         $quantityAvailable = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00253         if($quantityAvailable == 0xffff) {
00254             $quantityAvailable = -1;
00255         }       
00256         $lastUsageDate = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00257         $reuseInterval = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00258         
00259         $expiryDay = $reader->ReadInt(1);
00260         $expiryMonth = $reader->ReadInt(1);
00261         $expiryYear = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00262         $expiryDate = mktime(0,0,0,$expiryMonth,$expiryDay,$expiryYear);
00263         
00264         $reserved = array($reader->ReadInt(4),$reader->ReadInt(4),$reader->ReadInt(4));
00265         
00266         $agentName = $reader->ReadCString();
00267         $agentDescription = $reader->ReadCString();
00268         
00269         $installScript = str_replace(',',"\n",$reader->ReadCString());
00270         $removeScript = str_replace(',',"\n",$reader->ReadCString());
00271         
00272         $numEventScripts = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00273         
00274         $eventScripts = array();
00275         
00276         for($i=0;$i<$numEventScripts;$i++) {
00277             $eventScripts[] = str_replace(',',"\n",$reader->ReadCString());
00278         }
00279         $numDependencies = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00280         $dependencies = array();
00281         
00282         for($i=0;$i<$numDependencies;$i++) {
00283             $type = ($reader->ReadInt(2) == 0)?DEPENDENCY_SPRITE:DEPENDENCY_SOUND;
00284             $name = $reader->ReadCString();
00285             $dependencies[] = new COBDependency($type,$name);
00286         }
00287         $thumbWidth = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00288         $thumbHeight = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00289     
00290         $thumbnail = new S16Frame($reader,'565',$thumbWidth,$thumbHeight,$reader->GetPosition());
00291         $reader->Skip($thumbHeight*$thumbWidth*2);
00292         
00293         //parsing finished, onto making an AgentBlock.
00294         $agentBlock = new COBAgentBlock($agentName,$agentDescription);
00295         $agentBlock->AddQuantityAvailable($quantityAvailable);
00296         $agentBlock->AddReuseInterval($reuseInterval);
00297         $agentBlock->AddExpiryDate($expiryDate);
00298         $agentBlock->AddLastUsageDate($lastUsageDate);
00299         $agentBlock->AddReserved($reserved[0],$reserved[1],$reserved[2]);
00300         $agentBlock->AddInstallScript($installScript);
00301         $agentBlock->AddRemoveScript($removeScript);
00302         foreach($eventScripts as $eventScript) {
00303             $agentBlock->AddEventScript($eventScript);
00304         }
00305         foreach($dependencies as $dependency) {
00306             $agentBlock->AddDependency($dependency);
00307         }
00308         $agentBlock->AddThumbnail($thumbnail);
00309         return $agentBlock;
00310         
00311     }
00313 
00318     public static function CreateFromReaderC1(IReader $reader) {
00319         $quantityAvailable  = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00320         $expires_month = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00321         $expires_day = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00322         $expires_year = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00323         $expiryDate = mktime(0,0,0,$expires_month,$expires_day,$expires_year);
00324                 
00325         $numObjectScripts = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00326         $numInstallScripts = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00327         $quantityUsed = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00328         $objectScripts = array();
00329         for($i=0;$i<$numObjectScripts;$i++) {
00330             $scriptsize = $reader->ReadInt(1);
00331             if($scriptsize == 255) {
00332                 $scriptsize = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00333             }
00334             $objectScripts[$i] = $reader->Read($scriptsize);
00335         }
00336         $installScripts = array();
00337         for($i=0;$i<$numInstallScripts;$i++) {
00338             $scriptsize = $reader->ReadInt(1);
00339             if($scriptsize == 255) {
00340                 $scriptsize = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00341             }
00342             $installScripts[$i] = $reader->Read($scriptsize);
00343         }
00344         $pictureWidth = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00345         $pictureHeight = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00346         $unknown = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00347         $sprframe = null;
00348         if($pictureWidth > 0 || $pictureHeight > 0) {
00349             $sprframe = new SPRFrame($reader,$pictureWidth,$pictureHeight);
00350             $sprframe->Flip(); 
00351         }
00352         
00353         $agentName = $reader->Read($reader->ReadInt(1));
00354         
00355         $agentBlock = new COBAgentBlock($agentName,'');
00356         $agentBlock->AddQuantityAvailable($quantityAvailable);
00357         $agentBlock->AddExpiryDate($expiryDate);
00358         if($sprframe != null) {
00359           $agentBlock->AddThumbnail($sprframe);
00360         }
00361         foreach($objectScripts as $objectScript) {
00362             $agentBlock->AddEventScript($objectScript);
00363         }
00364         $agentBlock->AddInstallScript(implode("\n*c2ephp Install script seperator\n",$installScripts));
00365         return $agentBlock;
00366     }
00368 }
